foreignData.name: Die Säulengräber von Aku
foreignData.text: Jeder Spieler opfert während seiner Versorgungsphase eine Kreatur, oder dieser Spieler verliert 5 Lebenspunkte und Du begräbst die Säulengräber von Aku.

name: Pillar Tombs of Aku
originalText: During each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature, or that player loses 5 life and you bury Pillar Tombs of Aku.

rulings.text: This has the supertype world. When a world permanent enters the battlefield, any world permanents that were already on the battlefield are put into their owners’ graveyards. This is a state-based action called the “world rule.” The new world permanent stays on the battlefield. If two world permanents enter the battlefield at the same time, they’re both put into their owners’ graveyards.

text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may sacrifice a creature. If that player doesn't, they lose 5 life and you sacrifice Pillar Tombs of Aku.
